summary: The lives of Pomme, an aspiring singer, and Suzanne, a struggling mother, as they search for their own identity in 1970s France.
cast: Thérèse Liotard|Valérie Mairesse|Robert Dadiès|Mona Mairesse|Francis Lemaire|François Courbin|Ali Rafie|Gisèle Halimi|Salomé Wimille|Nicole Clément|Jean-Pierre Pellegrin|Joëlle Papineau|Micou Papineau|Doudou Greffier|Dane Porret|François Wertheimer|Mathieu Demy|Fred Maubert|François Gibert|Marion Hänsel|Jean Van Der Swalnen|Isabelle Eduards|Frédéric Boyot|Gilberte Sallé|Bénédicte Charonnet|Evelyne Tonietto|Élise Beltrame|Jeanine Braendlin|Gilette Barbier|Françoise Bette|Patricia Cartier|Dominique Ducros|Laurent Plagne|Laetitia Rojas|Sapho|Rosalie Varda
title: Una canta, otra no
